seo.title: Gallery
seo.description: Consult all pokemon cards from the community all around the world. Vote for your favorites cards or even share the cards you made and who knows you might be the next most amazing card.

no.title: No winner
no.description: No one got elected this week, no card received any like or has been created. Create your own and get elected on next election!

modal.shareSocial: Check this out! I created {{name}} my new pokemon card {{href}}

report.title: Report card {{name}}
report.description: If you determine that this card contains inappropriate content you can report it. After reporting, the moderation will determine as soon as possible if the quality of its content is abusive, if so the card will be permanently removed from the site.
report.label: Select a reason
report.success: Your report has been sent successfully
report.error: An error occured trying to send your report
